CNN.from sentence: With the objective of addressing both challenges , we learn a CNN to fit a 3 D face model to the face image .

first challenge.from sentence: To tackle first challenge of limited landmark labeling , we propose to employ additional constraints .

SIFT constraint.from sentence: We include contour constraint where the contour of the predicted shape should match the detected 2 D face boundary , and SIFT constraint where the SIFT key points detected on two face images of the same individual should map to the same vertexes on the 3D face model .

Both constraints.from sentence: Both constraints are integrated into the CNN training as additional loss function terms , where the end - to - end training results in an enhanced CNN for 3 D face model fitting .

second challenge.from sentence: For the second challenge of leveraging multiple datasets , the 3D face model fitting approach has the inherent advantage in handling multiple training databases .
